    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Reply

    public class PostMessage
extends com.xatkit.core.platform.action.RuntimeMessageAction<TelegramPlatform>
    A RuntimeMessageAction that posts a message to a given xatkit-react channel.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PostMessage

        public PostMessage(@NonNull
                   @NonNull TelegramPlatform platform,
                   @NonNull
                   @NonNull com.xatkit.execution.StateContext context,
                   @NonNull
                   @NonNull java.lang.String message,
                   @NonNull
                   @NonNull java.lang.String channel)
        Constructs a new PostMessage with the provided platform, session, message, and channel.

        This constructor is similar to new PostMessage(platform, session, message, Collections.emptyList (), channel).

        Parameters:
        platform - the TelegramPlatform containing this action
        context - the StateContext associated to this action
        message - the message to post
        channel - the xatkit-react channel to post the message to
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the provided message or channel is null

      • PostMessage

        public PostMessage(@NonNull
                   @NonNull TelegramPlatform platform,
                   @NonNull
                   @NonNull com.xatkit.execution.StateContext context,
                   @NonNull
                   @NonNull java.lang.String message,
                   @NonNull
                   @NonNull java.util.List<java.lang.String> buttons,
                   @NonNull
                   @NonNull java.lang.String channel)
        Constructs a new PostMessage with the provided platform, session, message, buttons, and channel.
        Parameters:
        platform - the TelegramPlatform containing this action
        context - the StateContext associated to this action
        message - the message to post
        buttons - the quick message buttons to display with the message
        channel - the xatkit-react channel to post the message to
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the provided channel is empty

    • Method Detail

      • compute

        protected java.lang.Object compute()
        Posts the provided message to the given channel.

        Posted messages are pushed to the telegra client through the TelegramBotWrapperLongPolling attached to the TelegramPlatform

        Specified by:
        compute in class com.xatkit.core.platform.action.RuntimeAction<TelegramPlatform>
        Returns:
        null
